markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">
[Stoke the Heart](/Spells.aspx?ID=1892)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 387 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Patron Theme**
[Faith's Flamekeeper](/Patrons.aspx?ID=12)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your patron fills a creature with fervor, empowering their blows. The target gains a +2 status bonus to damage rolls.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The status bonus to damage increases by 1.
name: Stoke the Heart
